definition[0]: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth
example[0]: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
example[1]: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
definition[1]: the protection given by a powerful country, army, a weapons system etc
example[2]: the American nuclear umbrella over western Europe
definition[2]: something which covers or includes a wide range of different parts
example[3]: The international organization pulls together a huge number of companies under the umbrella of the parent group.
